commands.descriptions: Translate the bot into Portuguese or English
Displays the number of users and bots on the server
Ban a user
Unban a user
Kick a user
Mute a user, that is, the user will not be able to send messages on the server
Unmute a user
Creates a normal text channel.
Creates a normal voice channel.
Creates a secret text channel.
Creates a secret voice channel.
Creates a category on the server
Deletes a category and all existing channels in the same
Removes an role from the user user
Remove all permissions (roles) from a category
Remove all roles from the server, with the exception of bot roles
Remove all categories and channels from the server
Remove a role from the server
Remove all permissions (roles) from a channel
Remove a role from all members
Remove nickname from all server members
Add a role to all members
Add a role to a specific member
Add role by reactions. You can add roles with editable texts or by embeds.
Offers a role for a period of time in seconds
Adds a delay (slowmode) to text channels
Add a new role to the server
Displays the number of members in a role
Defines a channel as chatguild. With this channel, owners and admins will be able to communicate with other owners and admins.
Creates a category for the tickets (secret channels) of the server.
Measure member interaction level. It will display a message when the user sends a certain amount of messages that will be defined by you
Defines a channel as not being a chatguild
Sends a message to the server informed by the ID
See the number of views, genres and tags used by youtubers
Send a message as a bot
Enable your server to be shared with other users
Share your Discord server on our Discord Server
Clone a category and all its channels
